title: Will London hit 5°C tomorrow?
description: This market resolves YES if the daily high temperature in London reaches or exceeds 5 degrees Celsius tomorrow. Very likely in winter.

title: Will New York City reach 0°C tomorrow?
description: Resolves YES if NYC daily max temp is 0C or above. Very likely.

title: Will Seoul temperature exceed -5°C tomorrow?
description: Market resolves YES if Seoul max temperature is above -5 degrees Celsius. Very likely even in winter.

title: Will London reach 20°C tomorrow?
description: Unlikely winter temperature target - should be cheap and stay cheap.

title: Will London hit 10°C tomorrow?
description: A market priced at 50/50 for testing filter.

title: Will NYC hit -10°C tomorrow?
description: High probability market that max temp exceeds -10C, priced expensive.
